dct_title_s: [Series of maps from Morse's Cerographic Bible atlas]
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on maps given in "Miles", "English miles", "Feet", and "Geogr. miles".
Includes 2 indexes: [Sites of interest in Sinai] -- Tribes.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
2 inset maps: Sinai -- Northern part of Mt. Lebanon on the scale of the principle map.
From Morse's The cerographic Bible atlas.
